title: Symbolism in Logan (Remastered) |  Ascending the Mountain
description:
The movie Logan has a very powerful symbolic structure which is based on the spiritual ascent up a mountain.  It is capable of showing all sides of its basic symbolic structure all at once. 

This is a remastered version of a simpler version which is still available here: https://youtu.be/7_Rnd4fJ6Bk

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
